meanings.definition: A yellow, water-soluble vitamin of the B complex, found in meat, liver, eggs, milk, and leafy vegetables.
meanings.sent1: Riboflavin is important for our health and can be found in eggs.
meanings.sent2: Milk is a good source of riboflavin, a vitamin that helps our bodies.
meanings.sent3: The eggs were so full of riboflavin that they practically glowed yellow!
meanings.sent4: In the garden of nutrients, riboflavin shines like a bright yellow sun.
meanings.sent5: The leafy vegetables were like a treasure trove of riboflavin, waiting to boost our energy.
